author: Odeinoichus
title: He is Strong Enough.
review:
Set #71012 Mr. Incredible: Arguably one of the most well-liked and best Pixar films The Incredibles have yet to receive representation in LEGO Form, until now.

Mr. Incredible is the Parr family Patriarch, this is the version in his red outfit. He's got dual-molding all around, with dual-molded arms and legs. Single-sided torso printing featuring his iconic logo and some printing for the tights around his... you know. He includes a printed tile with one of his old posters and a unique new hair piece that's only him. Still no duald-sided head though, none of the figures so far has had more than one expression.

Definitely recommend Mr. Incredible, and I really hope Elasti-Girl, Violet and Dash will be included in a future Series or two. There are enough Disney characters they could continue producing CMF sets for twenty years if they wanted.
